name: Gun Crow (Demo)
description:
Gun Crow is a game about Crow saving the universe from being completely reset with the help of Snek, a main character playing a major role in the story. Their mission is to collect 10 keys in reality-altering caves to stop the Ultra Gamma-Ray Laser from tearing a hole in reality.

Note that most of the elements described in the description might not be available in the DEMO version. If you want the full Gun Crow experience, you might be interested in the FULL GAME version :).
